summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of Two Thousand Two Hundred Fifty and no/100 Dollars ($2250.00) on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of West Blaine Street et al., by paving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 20380, creating Local Improvement District No. 1975.
